overview:
Abhijeet Vijayakar is the founder and CEO of Nunook Interactive.

Nunook Interactive designs, develops, markets and publishes games under the Nunook brand. The company’s flagship product is BrainNook, an online virtual world for kids.

BrainNook is a free virtual world that helps kids develop Math and English skills in a safe and fun online playground. In BrainNook, kids can play over a hundred educational games based on Math and English concepts, safely interact and compete with each other, and strengthen fundamental skills.

Every game in BrainNook can be played either alone, or in head-to-head competition with other kids.
